title: Nightly ICE regression

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

body:
```
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.24.0-nightly (77efd6800 2017-12-15) running on x86_64-pc-windows-msvc

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)`
  left: `1`,
 right: `0`', src\librustc_trans\type_.rs:293:8
note: Run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace.

error: Could not compile `select`.
```
